DOC.brief_summary: The trial is performed to assess efficacy and safety of Novo-Helisen Depot in allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of House Dust Mite Allergen Extract in the Treatment of Allergic Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Positive skin prick test to house dust mite, Positive RAST test to house dust mite, Positive provocation test result to house dust mite, Serious chronic diseases, Other perennial allergies
